title: Riot is Sion, Twitch, and Karthus  going to get skin splash art updates too????
body: Poppy got hers.... and now you plan to do it for Shen too.... what about the past reworked champions??? :/

replies.body: We're doing some work at the moment to put together a plan for champions that got reworked but didn't get updated skin splashes at the time. We should have some initial thoughts on what that approach will look like ready to share in a few weeks. To avoid setting unrealistic expectations, that doesn't mean we'll get to every champ that's been reworked quickly, we are going to try and work through that backlog though.
